Nationwide Essential Plan

The Nationwide Essential plan is a good option if you are planning a trip on a budget, but don't want to sacrifice coverage.

With coverages like trip cancellation, trip interruption and baggage protection, this plan includes the standard comprehensive travel insurance coverages. It also features some additional options. You can add the optional coverages for rental car collision if you are planning on using a rental car during your trip. Be sure to call your rental car company to verify if they will honor this coverage.

Coverages and Plan Info

The Nationwide Essential Plan coverage includes trip cancellation protection, trip interruption and lost luggage reimbursement, ensuring you're safeguarded against unexpected events. To get the most accurate information tailored to your specific travel needs, please start a quote.

  • Plan Summary
  • Plan Info
  • Trip Protection
  • Medical
  • Pre-Existing Conditions
  • Accidental Death
  • Evacuations
  • Additional Benefits

Plan Summary

Protect your trip with cancellation, interruption, delay and medical benefits.

Trip cancellation $5,000
Trip interruption $6,250
Baggage Loss $600 $250 per article limit $500 combined max. for specified items (secondary)
Baggage Delay  12+ hours $100 max.
Medical Limit $75,000 (secondary)
Pre-Existing Condition Waiver If insurance purchased within 10 days of Initial Trip Payment and certain conditions are met
Pre-Existing Condition Lookback Period 60 Days
Medical Evacuation $250,000 Repatriation of Remains $250,000
